tswitem.name: AE Convalescence Capacitor
tswitem.tooltip:
AE Convalescence Capacitor
AEGIS Capacitor (QL 0-9 Epic)
Character Bound
QL0: 230 - 242
QL1: 247 - 259
QL2: 265 - 277
QL3: 282 - 294
QL4: 300 - 312
QL5: 335 - 347
QL6: 361 - 373
QL7: 387 - 399
QL8: 414 - 426
QL9: 440 - 452		 AEGIS restored when using a direct heal
ability. AEGIS healing only restores
the strength of shields which match
your currently active weapon controller type.
Requires an AEGIS Controller of equal or greater QL to equip this item.
